context:
* The Financial Aid Office can be contacted at FinAid@georgebrown.ca for questions about financial assistance.
* OSAP provides financial assistance through loans and grants.
* There is an awards program to help students in financial need and those who do well academically.
* Emergency funding may be available for students.
* Aeroplan, TD Bank, or CIBC loyalty points can be used on campus.
* The college offers on-campus job opportunities for up to 15 hours a week.
* Students with a Registered Education Savings Plan (RESP) may be eligible for the Canadian Learning Bond.
* A payment plan is available for students to pay their semester tuition in three instalments.
* The phone number for George Brown College is 416-415-2000 and TTY is 1-877-515-5559.
* The email address for general inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* The website contains information subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty.
* Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
